ticket.title: large number of warnings generated by helpers
ticket.original-body:
I ran ruby-debug on mongrel_rails today and noticed a ton of warnings/errors coming out of rails. Here's a pastie:
http://gist.github.com/57861
I notice that a helper is missing, and actionpack is trying to load the same helper 8 times! I bet some optimization work could come out of this area.
I also noticed this exception, which probably shows some missing test coverage in action controller:
Exception `NameError' at /Users/scott/src/git/designcause/vendor/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:2037 - undefined local variable or method `controller' for #<SessionController:0x39034ec>

version.title: large number of warnings generated by helpers

version.body: AC internals are currently being rewritten, which should make for big changes in this area. Reopening if you still see problems after the new AC is integrated would be reasonable.
